sides.title: Heightened Perception
sides.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, engage at initiative 7 instead of your standard initiative value this phase.

sides.title: Instinctive Aim
sides.ability: While you perform a special attack, you may spend 1 [Force] to ignore the [Focus] or [Lock] requirement.

sides.title: Sense
sides.ability: During the System Phase, you may choose 1 ship at range 0-1 and look at its dial. If you spend 1 [Force], you may choose a ship at range 0-3 instead.

sides.title: Supernatural Reflexes
sides.ability: Before you activate, you may spend 1 [Force] to perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action. Then, if you performed an action you do not have on your action bar, suffer 1 [Hit] damage.

sides.title: Brilliant Evasion
sides.ability: While you defend, if you are not in the attacker's [Bullseye Arc], you may spend 1 [Force] to change 2 of your [Focus] results to [Evade] results.

sides.title: Hate
sides.ability: After you suffer 1 or more damage, recover that many [Force].

sides.title: Predictive Shot
sides.ability: After you declare an attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, during the Roll Defense Dice step, the defender cannot roll more defense dice than the number of your [Hit]/[Critical Hit] results.

sides.title: Battle Meditation
sides.ability: You cannot coordinate limited ships. While you perform a purple [Coordinate] action, you may coordinate 1 additional friendly non-limited ship of the same type. Both ships must perform the same action.

sides.title: Foresight
sides.ability: After an enemy ship executes a maneuver, you may spend 1 [Force] to perform this attack against it as a bonus attack. Attack: You may change 1 [Focus] result to a [Hit] result; your dice cannot be modified otherwise.

sides.title: Precognitive Reflexes
sides.ability: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1 [Force] to perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action. Then, if you performed an action you do not have on your action bar, gain 1 strain token. If you do, you cannot perform another action during your activation.
While you perform a [Boost] action, you may spend 1 [Force] to use the turn ([Turn Left] or [Turn Right]) template instead.
sides.title: Extreme Maneuvers

sides.ability: Before another friendly ship at range 0-2 would be dealt a faceup Pilot or Crew damage card, you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, that damage card is discarded instead, and you are dealt 1 facedown damage card. Then, if you have 2 or more damage cards, recover 2 [Force].
sides.title: Compassion

sides.ability: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 [Force] to change 1 [Focus] or [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result. If you do, after you perform that attack, if the defender was dealt 1 or more faceup Pilot or Crew damage cards, recover 2 [Force].
sides.title: Malice

sides.ability: While you perform an attack, if the attack is obstructed by an obstacle or the defender is at range 0 of an obstacle, you may spend 1 [Force] to add 1 [Focus] result.
sides.title: Shattering Shot

sides.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if there is an enemy ship in your [Front Arc], you may gain 1 deplete token to recover 1 [Force].
sides.title: Patience
Roiling Anger
sides.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if you are in an enemy ship's [Front Arc], you may gain 1 strain to recover 1 [Force].
